headline: How Investors Are Reacting To FedEx (FDX) Freight Spin-Off And Shift Toward Higher-Value Logistics Services
summary: In recent weeks, FedEx has advanced the planned spin-off of its FedEx Freight business, filing a Form-10 registration statement, arranging new credit facilities, and launching a private senior-notes offering to fund the separation expected to complete in June 2026. Alongside these steps, management is reshaping operations in markets such as France and securing new logistics contracts like CS Diagnostics’ MEDUSA SDP deliveries, underscoring an emphasis on focused networks, cost efficiency and...
